go_data.justification: SLP-76 is part of a complex that links TCR signaling to the remodeling of the actin cytoskeleton.
SLP-76 is tyrosine phosphorylated in response to T cell stimulation and is part of a complex that forms upon T cell activation.
SLP-76 is a substrate of the T cell antigen receptor-stimulated protein tyrosine kinases.
SLP-76 is part of a complex that interacts with the actin cytoskeleton.
SLP-76 is involved in T cell receptor-mediated signaling.
